sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense>1</defense> <description>Often worn by Jedi engaging in dangerous activity during the Clone Wars, armored robes grant exceptional protection. Armored robes are distinct and unmistakable, however, making them uncommon in Imperial space. Durable, hard-wearing robes are draped over a variant on the standard Jedi tunic and pants. Attached to the tunic and pants are sets of plasteel plates that provide similar protection to heavy battle armor. Of course, such gear is highly illegal on any Imperial world.  Models Include: Various cuts and styles.</description> <encumbrance>5</encumbrance> <hard_points>2</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Armored Robes</name> <number>GEAR0001042</number> <price>4500</price> <range/> <rarity>8</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak>2</soak> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 16:41:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8b5d32602f90a450e0f497eef699b6f8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 16:41:24</sys_updated_on> <type>armor</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
